headline: DTE Energy names Brenda Craig as Chief Communications Officer
summary: DTE Energy (NYSE: DTE) has named Brenda Craig Chief Communications Officer, effective Thursday, Oct. 30. Craig succeeds Paula Silver, senior vice president, Corporate Communications, DTE Foundation and Corporate Citizenship, who will retire at the end of October after a distinguished career. In her 10 years at DTE, Silver created a world-class communications team, driving a strategic change in how the company communicates with its stakeholders and developing new channels for two-way communicatio
